javafx.beans.value

Interface WritableIntegerValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WritableNumberValue, WritableValue<Number>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntegerProperty, IntegerPropertyBase, JavaBeanIntegerProperty, ReadOnlyIntegerWrapper, SimpleIntegerProperty, SimpleStyleableIntegerProperty, StyleableIntegerProperty

    public interface WritableIntegerValue
extends WritableNumberValue
    A writable int value.
    Since:
    JavaFX 2.0
    See Also:
    WritableValue, WritableNumberValue

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int get()
      Get the wrapped value.
      void set(int value)
      Set the wrapped value.
      void setValue(Number value)
      Set the wrapped value.

      • Methods inherited from interface javafx.beans.value.WritableValue

        getValue

    • Method Detail

      • get

        int get()
        Get the wrapped value. Unlike WritableValue.getValue(), this method returns primitive int. Needs to be identical to WritableValue.getValue().
        Returns:
        The current value

      • set

        void set(int value)
        Set the wrapped value. Unlike setValue(java.lang.Number), this method uses primitive int.
        Parameters:
        value - The new value

      • setValue

        void setValue(Number value)
        Set the wrapped value.

        Note: this method should accept null without throwing an exception, setting "0" instead.

        Specified by:
        setValue in interface WritableValue<Number>
        Parameters:
        value - The new value
